articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Spinner Ashwin retires from India duty
articles.description: India spinner Ravichandran Ashwin retires from international cricket at the age of 38.
articles.content: How Wham! turned one song into a cultural phenomenon. VideoHow Wham! turned one song into a cultural phenomenon

articles.title: Bumrah takes final-ball wicket after altercation
articles.description: Indian captain Jaspit Bumrah dismisses Usman Khawaja with the final ball of the day following an altercation with 19-year-old Austalian batter Sam Konstas on day one of the fifth Test at the Sydney Cricket Ground.
articles.content: The journalist, the manager, the fax machine and the hairdryer. Video, 00:02:55The journalist, the manager, the fax machine and the hairdryer

articles.title: Lyon strikes to give Australia Test win
articles.description: Nathan Lyon traps India's Mohammed Siraj lbw to give Australia a 184-run win in the fourth Test and give the hosts a 2-1 lead in the series.
articles.content: Watch as Nathan Lyon traps India's Mohammed Siraj lbw to give Australia a 184-run win in the fourth Test at the Melbourne Cricket Ground and give the hosts a 2-1 lead going into the final match in Syâ€¦ [+89 chars]
